notes: Each page has a dashboardView and a changeView.
dashboardView can be a Grafana dashboard (by uid) or a control-panels layout.
changeView is always a control-panels layout.
All states are included exactly as provided.

WinterNightThreshold.label: Lüftung aus/low ab °C in der Nacht

properties.value: val => !val ? '' :  ('0' + (new Date(val)).getDate()).slice(-2) + '.' + ('0' + ((new Date(val)).getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2) + '.' + (new Date(val)).getFullYear() + ' - ' + ('0' + (new Date(val)).getHours()).slice(-2)+ ':' + ('0' + (new Date(val)).getMinutes()).slice(-2) + ' Uhr'
